com.socialize.ui.comment

Interface OnCommentViewActionListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SocializeListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LinkifyCommentViewActionListener

    public interface OnCommentViewActionListener
extends SocializeListener
    Provides a callback for comment view events.

    jasonpolites
